description.full: (ONLINE INTERACTIONS NOT RATED BY THE ESRB)  Wage war with five factions, each with unique abilities, in the original game of strategy and world domination! Play with the classic rules or reign supreme with objective-based and world conquest scenarios as you command your army and take tactical gambles to win the day. Then challenge your friends in local or online multiplayer and see how you stack up on the leaderboards. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB. Wage war with five factions, each with unique abilities, in the original game of strategy and world domination! Play with the classic rules or reign supreme with objective-based and world conquest scenarios as you command your army and take tactical gambles to win the day. Then challenge your friends in local or Xbox LIVE multiplayer and see how you stack up on the leaderboards.
